Real-Time Operation System

Detailed Description


Modules

 Tasks / Threads
 This modules provides functions for creating and manipulating tasks/threads.
 Timer Functions
 This module provides a fine timer in system clk ticks (1/49152000 sec), it includes high 32 bit and low 32 bit.
 Semaphores
 Provides RTOS semaphores.
 Message Queues
 Provides RTOS message queues.
Untitled Document
